Summon Units:#489 Demon Knight
The caster sacrifices several blood slaves to summon and bind a Demon Knight to his service. The Demon Knight is an armored demon riding a demonic steed with glowing red eyes. Demon Knights are horrible to behold and their mere presence will cause panic among weaker troops.
